subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers jumped back in the N.L.C.S. the same way the Cardinals had taken the lead in it, with a dominating pitching performance, a few clutch at-bats and heads-up plays.
snippet: The Dodgers jumped back in the N.L.C.S. the same way the Cardinals had taken the lead in it, with a dominating pitching performance, a few clutch at-bats and heads-up plays.
